howToPlay.title: How to play
howToPlay.description: At each level, you will be provided with a set of letters and a theme.
howToPlay.goal: Your goal is to find all the words related to the theme using the provided letters.
howToPlay.item1: Click on the letters to form a word related to the theme.
howToPlay.item2: Then, press the 'Next word' button to save the word.
howToPlay.item3: Repeat steps 1 and 2 to find all possible words in the level.
howToPlay.item4: Then, press the 'Check' button to verify your answers.

endText: You have completed all levels. Congratulations!
